long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever search for something on Google, only to accidentally click on one of those advertisements disguised as a search result? AdHighlighter will help you recognize targeted ads so you can avoid clicking them accidentally. Some people don't like the idea of using ad blockers, and AdHighlighter is an alternative way to avoid this particular annoyance.
